definition: "Sogar" is an adverb that is commonly used to express a sense of surprise or emphasis when comparing or contrasting two things. It often implies that the second thing mentioned is unexpected or goes beyond what was anticipated.

examples.german: Er hat sogar den Marathon gewonnen.
Sie hat sogar ihr eigenes Haus gebaut.
examples.english: She even built her own house.

examples.german: Sogar die Kinder haben es verstanden.
Er hat sogar einen Job in der Firma bekommen.
examples.english: He even got a job in the company.

examples.english: Even the weather was perfect for our trip.
